H0.text: Who wrote the 1993 novel “The Joy Luck Club”. Amy Tan

H1.text: Who wrote the 1993 novel “The Joy Luck Club”. Maxine Hong Kingston

H2.text: Who wrote the 1993 novel “The Joy Luck Club”. Ha Jin

H3.text: Who wrote the 1993 novel “The Joy Luck Club”. 譚恩美

A4.text: Amy Ruth Tan is the author of The Joy Luck Club (1989), which was adapted into a 1993 film.

A5.text: The Joy Luck Club consists of eight related stories about the experiences of four Chinese–American mother–daughter pairs.
